lead_paragraph: Cincinnati will play the Big 12 Conference power Oklahoma in a home-and-home series. The Bearcats of the Big East will travel to Norman, Okla., for a game Sept. 6, 2008, then play host to the Sooners on Sept. 25, 2010, at Paul Brown Stadium. The two have never played in football.
